revised_title: A Comparative Crystallographical Study of Double Selenates in the Magnesium Series
tldr: This study investigates the crystallographical properties of double selenates in the magnesium series, focusing on the salts with alkali metals potassium, rubidium, and cesium. The research reveals a progression of properties in accordance with the atomic weights of the alkali metals, and the unique optical phenomena exhibited by cesium magnesium selenate.
